short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HNSchat. A decentralised chat using handshake names. Own your identity now. Chat privately. Send crypto. And more to come!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add hnschat to your browser and start chatting right away!
Don't stop what you are doing anymore! Just to give a quick reply without leaving your tab! 
This extension encapsulates hnschat. It uses hnschat as a whole, with all of it's functionality, and adds it directly to your browser.
Hnschat is a decentralised chat that uses the handshake protocol. More information on the protocol can be found on handshake.org.
Hnschat itself is still being developed. Every day new features are being added. It has become the meeting point for the HNS-community!  
Come meet the community on the chat! Start private encrypted conversations and send coins to your friends. If you don't have a handshake name yet, get your free one right on the chat!
Check it out now!

*This extension is an experimental, open-source and free-for-use, and it will remain that way! 
No rights can be derived from using this product, nor can the developer(s) be hold responsible for any harm or damage caused by the use of this product.
